attributes.action: Petitions web site searching is difficult
attributes.additional_details: You can only search existing petitions by key words.  Often several petitions on the same subject are open but hard to find as described slightly differently. I would like to see petitions recorded in categories and sub categories like......housing....eg sub category house building....health.....eg sub category gp services.....pensions....banking....the environment .....eg sub category wildlife.....etc etc
attributes.background: Petitions are not put into categories. Finding similar petitions is difficult.
